## `CrossReferenceWordLists`

Compares two word lists and creates a new one that contains only the words that appear in both of them.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
boolean CrossReferenceWordLists(string wordList,
                                string otherWordList,
                                string outputFile)
```


### Return value {-}

Type: `boolean`

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
|`string` wordList |      | 
|`string` otherWordList |      | 
|`string` outputFile |      |
